basic.spi_clkfreq_description: The SPI clock frequency to use.
basic.watchdog_timeout_description: Seconds of no communication after which the Monarco HAT watchdog will power-cycle the Raspberry Pi. Set to 0 to disable.
basic.update_interval_description: The interval at which the integration communicates with the Monarco HAT over SPI. If using the watchdog, set this to a value of 0.1 (100ms) or lower to appease the watchdog.
